title: 257: CHATTY BROS: Pop Culture Hot Takes!
itunes:title: 257: CHATTY BROS: Pop Culture Hot Takes!
description:
The Bros, Grayston and Evan, are here and they are taking on some pop culture news! They discuss Ben and JLo rekindling their romance, Ben Affleck and Matthew Perry on dating apps, Bill and Melinda Gates divorce (and Jeffery Epstein’s part in it), Gwyneth Paltrow eating pasta and drinking quinoa based whiskey, Caitlyn Jenner running for governor, Arnold Schwarzenegger stories, Matt James and Rachael reuniting, their takes on The Broads and Reality Steve, and more! 

 

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***JENNI KAYNE: Go to JENNIKAYNE.COM to get 15% off your first order when you use code CHATTY at checkout!

***DIPSEA: Dipsea is offering an extended 30-day free trial when you go to DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY

***IMPERFECT FOODS: Get 20% off PLUS free shipping on your first order at IMPERFECTFOODS.COM by using promo code CHATTY

***NUTS.COM: Get free shipping on your first order when you text CHATTY to 64-000

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
